subject: Urgent
description_text:
Hello I have had my pros for 1 year and up till now they have been fantastic but all of a sudden they are not recognised in any game but the Simsonn software is picking them up can you help in anyway 

Stephen Elward

conversations.body_text: ID 号为 9940 和 10041 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单9940  
      主题: Help  
      描述:  Helol and greetings from the UK,  i have the plus pedals and f1 25 is not recognising them any help would be appreciated   Steve   Sent from my iPhone

合并来自工单10041  
      主题: Pro pedals  
      描述:  Hello I have had my pros for 1 year and up till now they have been fantastic but all of a sudden they are not recognised in any game but the Simsonn software is picking them up can you help in anyway   Stephen Elward  Sent from my iPhone

Hi Stephen Elward,    If your pedal is version 1.7.1, you can download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 using the link below. Then, follow the steps below to update the firmware:    If the software indicates that the version is too old, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu to start the firmware update;    After the firmware update is completed, release the upgrade button;    Finally, test the pedal and perform a calibration.    Additionally, please ensure that your computer is properly grounded.     https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
